summary: Retex the vampire royal armor with a "cold-fire" version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][img]http://files.elderscrollsonline.com/uploads/blogs/a6d2d76fc2eb5a1a786ea18e1d55d928.jpg[/img]
This mod retextures the normal royal vampire armor of dawnguard with a molag bal's coldharbour version. Cold-fire is one of the most present elements in coldharbour.[/color][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000]
[/color][/font][/size][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000]THE MOD NEEDS DAWNGUARD !

Male AND female in the same file !
[/color][/font]
author: SamyFrench94
